meanings.sent1: The prechosen winner of the contest was announced yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She wore her prechosen outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: The prechosen dessert mysteriously disappeared from the fridge.
meanings.sent4: His prechosen path led him to unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent5: The prechosen color scheme made the room feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.sent1: They prechosen the menu for the event weeks ahead.
meanings.sent2: He prechosen his travel companions for the trip.
meanings.sent3: She prechosen her movie night snacks carefully.

meanings.sent5: Before the meeting, they prechosen the topics to discuss.
